title: Teach me how I can do it myself: the Montessori Method in the Netherlands (TEFC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Montessori method of education
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Experimental methods
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Infants - Development

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Infants - Development
description: Dr. Maria Montessori's original contribution to the psychology of education has left a mark on present day schooling throughout the world. This film aims to give an impression of the methods she worked out for infant and primary school, based upon the child's genuine needs.
